result.title: Team Selection & Team Training
result.content:
Factors affecting team selection

There will be three main factors to determine the team selection:

  • The individual ratings generated from the ranking contests.

  • Team chemistry: team members should be able to communicate easily with each other either in a practice environment or in a contest environment.

  • Individual potential: as in what an individual can reach before the next ECPC given a correct training system.

Team Training

I'll be coaching some of FCIS ASU's teams for this season, and khaledkee will be co-coaching the same teams. These teams will be selected mainly based on there individual performance in the ranking contests. Non-selected teams will be provided with some guidelines on what they should do and how to train and get ready for the next season.
